thread.title: Moving Pet from Germany to India
thread.title_full: Moving Pet from Germany to India

author: nmenon
title: Moving Pet from Germany to India
text: India Mike » Community Forums » India Expat Area » Moving Pet from Germany to India Moving Pet from Germany to India Hi. We are relocating to India. We plan to bring our pet (small dog) from Germany to India. 1. Can someone let us know if they have done this before? 2. Any guidance on how to get the paperwork in Germany would be great, including how to find an (i) Authorized Vet, (ii) Authorized Government Authority, (iii) Etc. Thank you,
